definitions.text: the act of caressing with the lips (or an instance thereof)
a vehicle carrying many passengers; used for public transport
examples: he always rode the bus to work

definitions.text: the topology of a network whose components are connected by a busbar
an electrical conductor that makes a common connection between several circuits
examples: the busbar in this computer can transmit data either way between any two components of the system

definitions.text: a car that is old and unreliable
examples: the fenders had fallen off that old bus

definitions.text: touch with the lips or press the lips (against someone's mouth or other body part) as an expression of love, greeting, etc.
examples: She kissed her grandfather on the forehead when she entered the room

definitions.text: send or move around by bus
examples: The children were bussed to school

definitions.text: remove used dishes from the table in restaurants
